meanings.sent1: The axised wheel spun smoothly on its axis.
meanings.sent2: The axised globe displayed the Earth's rotation.
meanings.sent3: The axised toy car wobbled hilariously on its axis.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were axised, revolving around a central idea.
meanings.sent5: The axised sculpture stood out among the other artworks.

meanings.definition: Arranged in a particular way around an axis.
meanings.sent1: The axised shelves in the library held many books.
meanings.sent2: The axised planets moved gracefully in their orbits.
meanings.sent3: The axised flowers in the garden bloomed beautifully around the center.
meanings.sent4: His life felt axised, revolving around work and family.
meanings.sent5: The axised pattern on the rug added a unique touch to the room.

meanings.definition: Having a specified number of axes.
meanings.sent1: The axised object had two clear axes of symmetry.
meanings.sent2: The axised crystal showed multiple axes of reflection.
meanings.sent3: The axised dice rolled unpredictably with its many axes.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was axised, balancing on different emotional axes.
meanings.sent5: The axised design of the building allowed for optimal support.
